response.original_title: 鎌足−夢のまほろば、大和し美し−
response.overview: The Asuka period. In a school opened by the Buddhist priest Sōmin who has returned from studying abroad in China, amongst the sons of the nobility studying the continent's latest culture and disciplines, two young men are in attendance who will come to play a big part in upending an era.
response.title: 鎌足−夢のまほろば、大和し美し−
